step5: Rokkr is an online video streaming program that streams popular TV shows and movies for free It also streams the movies and videos in the classic DVD quality. Unlike other online video services, Rokkr offers both free and paid membership options. In addition to online viewing, it also has video download capabilities to view the videos in the offline mode without Wi-Fi connection. Its subscription fees are quite affordable considering the benefits and convenience it provides.
step6: To use the online Rokkr service, one just needs to subscribe with an existing user or create a new account. The Rokkr site supplies all the tools needed for the users to stream movies with the help of a web browser. The user only needs to visit the site and type in the credit card details. Once the user accepts the terms of service, the box instantly starts the video streaming session with the help of a flash player.
